songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
People always say
They lookin' for connection
Well, me and you don't look, we just connect
And people also say
They strive for perfection
With you there's nothing left to perfect

[Chorus]
'Cause you flawless (Flawless)
What more can I say?
Yeah, you flawless (Flawless)
In every single way

[Verse 2]
I've heard people say
Beauty's in the eye of the beholder
Well, I'm that beholder in this case
And I think that if all the world's greatest poets, playwrights, and authors
Collaborated with its greatest painters and sculptors
They still couldn't do justice to your face

[Chorus]
'Cause it's flawless (Flawless)
Damn, look at you
Girl, you flawless (Flawless)
In everything you do

[Bridge]
You're the proof that God is a man
I'm holdin' you as close as I can
I swear I should be called your majesty
When I'm in your company

[Verse 3]
People say
A lot of things
Let me put a suggestion in your box
I'd say that, um, my advice to ya
Is whatever you been doin'
Just keep on doin' it and don't ever stop (Stop)
Never stop, don't stop

[Chorus]
'Cause you flawless (Flawless)
What more can I say?
Yeah, you flawless (Flawless)
In every single way
Every day, I wanna say
That I love you babe, yeah
One, two, three, four, five, smoke weed
songs.title: Flawless
